textTemplates.name: Disclaimer_TxtBody
textTemplates.text:
Disclaimer: You are receiving this email because of your relationship with Spark Digital. ################################################################################## Attention: This e-mail message is privileged and confidential. If you are not the intended recipient please delete the message and notify the sender. Any views or opinions presented are solely those of the author.
Scanned by Spark Securemail SPE2 ##################################################################################

textTemplates.name: Footnote_ExitWindow
textTemplates.text: To exit or close current window - use the 'x' in the top right part of the window or use keyboard shortcut: Alt + F4

textTemplates.name: ReviewInstructions
textTemplates.text: Please review your request details below, if Correct and you wish to submit request, click 'NEXT' or exit window

textTemplates.name: SF_SRorINC_to_Remedy_Chttr
textTemplates.text: As the case was marked escalated to Spark, an email has been automatically send to Spark Remedy email address. A Spark Remedy ticket should be created shortly.

textTemplates.name: SF_SRUpgrade_to_Remedy_Chttr
textTemplates.text: As the upgrade/downgrade has been approved and the case Spark Service Request type has been correctly specified an email has been automatically sent to Spark Remedy email address.A Spark Remedy ticket should be created shortly
